text: Hi all! Does anyone know how I can sync Theme folder files from HubSpot to local dev environment (VS Code specifically)? I have the HS CLI installed but cannot find the command for it.

hi <@U04B3M0M18E> - you can "sync" the local to HS with following commands:
• hs fetch ... -> fetch everything from HS to local
• hs upload ... -> upload everything from local to HS
• hs watch ... -> constantly watching for changes in local env and auto uploading to HS/Git(what ever you've set up)
More upon this topic <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/setup/getting-started-with-local-development#2.-configure-the-local-development-tools|in the docs >

Hi everyone, I wasn't sure which channel to post in but I need help with deleting activities (Such as email threads and attachments) that accidentally get associated with the wrong deal or ticket. For example, my client's team is forwarding emails from referrals to a specific inbox in HubSpot. But because these emails are coming from referrers (i.e. hospitals, GPs, retirement centres), they sometimes forward an old email that mentions other deals or tickets. So now, the old thread is causing associations for the new conversation. I may have found a solution through an app but I was wondering if anyone knows of a solution that doesn't require a third party app.
